scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: npm run clean:commonjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir dist/commonjs --ignore '**/__fixtures__/**/*,src/cosmos.proxies.js'
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es --ignore '**/__fixtures__/**/*,src/cosmos.proxies.js'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:commonjs && npm run clean:es
